text: Hagi zamagama havizama hunege'za kama vuga'ma osu'naza vahe'ma osi'ama mani'naza nagara zamazeri atru hugahue. Ana nehu'na ru kumategama kinama ome hu'za mani'naza nagamokizmia zamazeri hanavetisuge'za hanave vahe fore hugahaze. Ana nehanage'na Ra Anumzamo'na Jerusalemi kumate mani'nena Nagrania kegava huzmante vava hugahie.
